pages.title: tags
pages.text: const add = (...args) => { let vars = [] const curried = (...c) => { vars = [...vars, ...c] return curried } curried.toString = () => { return vars.reduce((a, b) => a + b, 0) } return curried(...args) } console.log(add(1)(2)(3).toString()); console.log(add(1, 2, 3)(4).toString()); console.log(add(1)(2)(3)(4)(5).toString());

posts.title: Hello
posts.text: const add = (...args) => { let vars = [] const curried = (...c) => { vars = [...vars, ...c] return curried } curried.toString = () => { return vars.reduce((a, b) => a + b, 0) } return curried(...args) }
